name: Tombstone
description: \BTaunt. Dust: \rAdd a random Equip to your hand.

name: Alergic Temmie
description: \BSick. Turn Start: \rGive an ally monster \BSick \rand \G+3 HP\r.

name: Driving Dog
description: \BRush. \rWhenever a monster dies, give both player \P+1 TAX.

name: Traffic Light
description: \BTimer (2). Repeat Start: Encounter \ra card from your deck. Give it \BTimer (3)\r.

name: Blueprints
description: \BCan't Attack. Power (1): \rSelect an enemy monster to attack.

name: Elder Puzzler
description: \BMagic: \rSwap both sides of the enemy board.

name: Charles
description: \BDelay: \rMove an enemy monster to a slot on the opposite side of the their board if possible.

name: Big Hat Charles
description: \BRush. Quiet. Kill: \rMove to a slot on the opposite side of your board if possible.

name: Rouxls Kaard
description: \BPower (2): Encounter \ra copy of a card from the opponent's hand.

name: Cactus
description: \BRush. Attack: \rIf the target was a monster, deal \Y2 DMG \rto the enemy hero.
